31640.rationale: Rigid bronchoscopy with mechanical tumor debulking of the distal trachea and left main bronchus is described as the main therapeutic procedure.

31654.rationale: Radial EBUS was used during bronchoscopy to evaluate a peripheral lesion; this is appropriately captured as an add-on EBUS code.

99231.rationale: A subsequent inpatient interval assessment and plan is documented, consistent with a low-complexity subsequent hospital visit.

31636.rationale: The note describes revision and replacement of an existing airway stent during rigid bronchoscopy, consistent with an add-on stent procedure.

Adjunct radial EBUS and a separately documented subsequent inpatient visit justify 31654 and 99231; no additional distinct bronchoscopic or pleural procedures require separate CPT coding.

31627.rationale: Computer-assisted navigation (Ion robotic system) was used to target bilateral pulmonary nodules during bronchoscopy.

31654.rationale: Radial EBUS was used to localize the peripheral targets before sampling; coded as a separate add-on EBUS service.

31628.rationale: Transbronchial lung biopsies of a primary lobe are documented with forceps and cryobiopsy techniques.

31632.rationale: Additional transbronchial biopsy sampling was performed in a second lobe, supporting an additional-lobe add-on code.

note_level_rationale: The note describes Ion robotic navigation with radial EBUS and transbronchial biopsies in two lobes; 31627, 31654, 31628, and add-on 31632 appropriately capture this work.
No separate conventional bronchoscopy, BAL only, or pleural procedures beyond those implied in the navigation and biopsy sequence are documented, so no additional CPT codes are added.

note_level_rationale: The procedure is limited to diagnostic EBUS bronchoscopy with TBNA of multiple nodal stations; 31653 alone accurately reflects the work.
No parenchymal lung biopsy, navigation bronchoscopy, stent work, or pleural procedures are performed, so no additional CPTs are indicated.

31627.rationale: Electromagnetic navigation bronchoscopy was used to guide instruments to a lung nodule; this supports the computer-assisted navigation add-on code.

31654.rationale: Radial EBUS was used to confirm lesion position during navigational bronchoscopy, appropriate for the peripheral EBUS add-on.

31628.rationale: Transbronchial lung biopsy of the index lobe is clearly described, including multiple passes and pathologic confirmation.

31632.rationale: Sampling of a second lobe with transbronchial biopsy is documented, supporting the additional-lobe add-on.

31653.rationale: Systematic EBUS TBNA of three or more nodal stations is documented before proceeding to peripheral sampling, supporting 31653 as the primary code.

31627.rationale: Robotic or EMN navigation was used to reach a peripheral lung lesion after nodal staging, consistent with the navigation add-on.

31654.rationale: Radial EBUS confirmation of the peripheral lesion is described during the same bronchoscopy.

31628.rationale: Transbronchial parenchymal biopsies of the target lobe are performed under navigation and radial EBUS guidance.

31654.rationale: Radial EBUS was used in conjunction with navigation to confirm lesion position before sampling.

31628.rationale: Transbronchial lung biopsies of the index lobe are reported, matching the primary parenchymal biopsy code.

No mediastinal staging EBUS, stent manipulation, or separate pleural procedure is performed, so no additional CPT codes are needed.

31631.rationale: The procedure involves complex airway dilation and placement of a Y-stent across the carina with extensions into the main bronchi, supporting multiple units of the tracheobronchial stent placement code.

31633.rationale: Additional segmental work beyond the initial stent deployment is documented, aligning with an add-on airway intervention in the same bronchoscopic session.

31637.rationale: Removal or revision of prior airway stent hardware is described before new stent placement, supporting a stent revision/removal add-on code.

note_level_rationale: The note describes complex therapeutic bronchoscopy with airway dilation, removal of prior stent material, and placement of a new silicone Y-stent; this pattern is consistent with multiple units of 31631 plus add-on codes 31633 and 31637.
There is no mediastinal EBUS node sampling or navigational bronchoscopy in this encounter, so bronchoscopy navigation codes are not added.

31654.rationale: Radial EBUS imaging was employed during the bronchoscopic intervention for the peripheral lesion.

31628.rationale: Transbronchial lung biopsy of the target lobe is clearly documented with multiple passes.

31626.rationale: Placement of fiducial markers for future stereotactic radiotherapy is performed during the same bronchoscopic session.

No simultaneous chest tube thoracostomy, pleuroscopy, or pleural biopsies are documented in this encounter.

32550.rationale: The chart reflects a pleural intervention with tube placement for management of effusion and pneumothorax; the existing CPT selection uses 32550, which has been retained without change.

note_level_rationale: The procedure note describes pleural access and drainage with tube placement and talc pleurodesis; local coding practices may vary, but the current CPT list has been preserved because alternative thoracoscopic coding cannot be confidently derived from the available text.
